author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I discuss how different Linux distributions are facing attacks which could be a result of the increased popularity of Linux, hackers are taking advantage of Linux newcomers with the death of windows 10, and information security is more important than ever in the Linux community.

My merch is available at
https://based.win/
